thread.title: These Transparent Kayaks Allow You to See the Underwater World Below
thread.title_full: These Transparent Kayaks Allow You to See the Underwater World Below

author: Macy Williams
title: These Transparent Kayaks Allow You to See the Underwater World Below
text:
These Transparent Kayaks Allow You to See the Underwater World Below February 17, 2017 by Macy Williams 308 Shares 
If you want to take your adventuresome side to the next level, this Crystal Explorer Kayak will do the trick. The clear canoe-kayak hybrid allows you to observe the water beneath you without any obstruction. It works in both smooth and choppy waters, so you can use it just about anywhere. Plus it's really lightweight so it's easy to carry around. 
This amount of awesomeness comes at a price â€” the kayak costs $1,500 . Check out the product shot below. Who's going to grab a paddle? Related:
